title: 83/289/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 May 1983 amending Decision 81/983/EEC approving certain food-aid operations carried out by humanitarian organizations and exempting them from monetary compensatory amounts (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 30 May 1983
amending Decision 81/983/EEC approving certain food-aid operations carried out by humanitarian organizations and exempting them from monetary compensatory amounts
(Only the English text is authentic)
(83/289/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. Article 1 (1) of Decision 81/983/EEC is replaced by the following:
'1. The food-aid operations carried out by the organizations listed in the Annex are hereby approved for the purposes of Article 21 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1371/81 with effect from 14 March 1983.'
2. The attached Annex is to be added to Decision 81/983/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:

For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
